definition: Leipzig, city in the state of Saxony, Germany
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: The Fair in Leipzig and fine porcelain in Meissen are well known around the world.
sentences.chinese: 萊比錫的博覽會和邁森的精美瓷器更是享譽世界。

sentences.english: A city of east-central Germany on the Elbe River east-southeast of Leipzig.
sentences.chinese: 德累斯頓德國中東部城市，位於萊比錫東南偏東河畔。

sentences.english: Leipziger Auwald. Auwald floodplain forest, Leipzig .
Leipziger Messe, Zentralhalle. Leipzig New Fair exhibition centre: central hall.
sentences.chinese: 萊比錫博覽會，中央玻璃大廳。

sentences.english: Jacques Loussier Trio Play Bach Live from St. Thomas's Church, Leipzig. Jacques Loussier.
sentences.chinese: 年萊比錫托馬斯大教堂現場三重奏。

sentences.english: After four months, she and her sisters were moved to an ammunition factory near Leipzig.
sentences.chinese: 四個月後，她和姐姐被送到萊比錫附近的一個彈藥廠。

definition: Stuttgart city in southwest Germany and capital of Baden-Württemberg 巴登·符騰堡州|巴登·符腾堡州[Ba1 deng1 · Fu2 teng2 bao3 zhou1]
